meanings.sent1: She felt humbugged by the false promises of the salesman.
meanings.sent2: The magician humbugged the audience with his disappearing act.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox humbugged the naive rabbit into sharing its carrots.
meanings.sent4: The con artist humbugged his way into the trust of many unsuspecting victims.
meanings.sent5: The children were humbugged by the tricky puzzle, but eventually solved it.

meanings.sent1: He humbugged his friend by pretending to be someone else on the phone.
meanings.sent2: The scammer humbugged people into giving away their personal information.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat humbugged the dog by hiding its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The sly fox humbugged the farmer by stealing his chickens.
meanings.sent5: The prankster humbugged his classmates by switching their backpacks.

meanings.sent1: The humbugged customers demanded a refund when they realized they were tricked.
meanings.sent2: His elaborate humbugged scheme was finally uncovered by the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show was full of humbugged antics that kept the audience laughing.
meanings.sent4: The mystery novel was filled with twists and turns of humbugged plots.
meanings.sent5: The old man's stories were always full of humbugged tales from his adventurous past.
